attributes.action: New Prime Minister should get there mandate approved via General Election.
attributes.background: For the next prime minister to call a general election with in 30 day, so they can get there mandate approved by the general public. so we can choose which direction we wish to go as a country.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

If a Prime Minister resigns a general election should be called: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620016

Impose new requirements on replacing the Prime Minister and subsequent election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623200
